pullrequest.title: Allow specifying physics engine in sdf file

content.raw:
In commit [b2913c5](https://bitbucket.org/j_li0/ign-gazebo/commits/b2913c58db9760ae15de8c9f2061ca45be27c0bc?at=ign-gazebo2), physics has been changed to be a component rather than an entity, as suggested by @{557058:90bc87b0-2886-4377-a17c-3a6629a697ff} .

‌

As for specifying multiple physics engines in sdf, from what I [read](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=preset_manager&cat=physics), that is for switching between physics engines during simulation.

Since the actual functionality of switching between physics engines would warrant another pull request \(which I think would affect a lot of things\), could we leave the support for multiple physics engine for the future?
